com.groupA.location.world

Interface LocationManagerFragment.LocationManagerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainActivity
    Enclosing class:
    LocationManagerFragment

    public static interface LocationManagerFragment.LocationManagerListener
    The activity that deals with the manager -- that is, MainActivity -- must implement the following functions:

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onLocationAvailable()
      The location services are now available
      void onLocationChanged(Location location)
      The current location changed
      void onLocationUnavailable()
      The location services are now unavailable
      void onNoLocationServices()
      Location Services not available
